findings.lower_chest: Bibasilar atelectasis; no evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion.

abdomen.hepatobiliary: Liver demonstrates homogenous attenuation with no focal lesions; gallbladder normal.
abdomen.pancreas: Normal attenuation without focal lesions or ductal dilatation.
abdomen.urinary: Normal and symmetric kidneys with bilateral subcentimeter renal hypodensities likely representing simple cysts.
abdomen.gastrointestinal: Normal small bowel caliber and wall thickness; equivocal subtle fat stranding in the proximal sigmoid colon suggesting mild sigmoid diverticulitis.
abdomen.pelvis: Unremarkable urinary bladder and distal ureters; no free fluid.
abdomen.vascular: No abdominal aortic aneurysm; presence of chronic thrombus and atheromatous plaque in relevant arteries.
abdomen.bones: No evidence of worrisome lesions or acute fracture; left hip prosthesis noted.
